com.shwy.bestjoy.utils

类 Base64InputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • com.shwy.bestjoy.utils.Base64InputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Base64InputStream
extends java.io.FilterInputStream
    An InputStream that does Base64 decoding on the data read through it.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 java.io.FilterInputStream

        in

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Base64InputStream(java.io.InputStream in, int flags)
      An InputStream that performs Base64 decoding on the data read from the wrapped stream.
      Base64InputStream(java.io.InputStream in, int flags, boolean encode)
      Performs Base64 encoding or decoding on the data read from the wrapped InputStream.

    • 方法概要

      方法

      int read(byte[] b, int off, int len)

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Base64InputStream

        public Base64InputStream(java.io.InputStream in,
                 int flags)
        An InputStream that performs Base64 decoding on the data read from the wrapped stream.
        参数:
        in - the InputStream to read the source data from
        flags - bit flags for controlling the decoder; see the constants in Base64

      • Base64InputStream

        public Base64InputStream(java.io.InputStream in,
                 int flags,
                 boolean encode)
        Performs Base64 encoding or decoding on the data read from the wrapped InputStream.
        参数:
        in - the InputStream to read the source data from
        flags - bit flags for controlling the decoder; see the constants in Base64
        encode - true to encode, false to decode
